This is an old game and can be great fun, even by yourself. I only have a little amount of time in this game, this is because I love playing these games with friends and I haven't got the opportunity lately. From what I have played it has good maps, pretty good game mechanics and the guns are fun to use. Good game, 7/10.
i just have it for gmod.

Counter-Strike is the best multi-player shooter and Source is the best Counter-Strike. Configuring self-hosted games is simpler than in CS:GO and the graphics are not really that far behind CS:GO either.

I rather enjoy playing this game offline with bots, as it is highly customizable (e.g. you can choose what weapon types the bots are allowed to use, you can change how many bots there are, you can choose how well they play), requires skill, and has many features available for free that you need to pay for in CS:GO (sprays, you can choose your playermodel), and some you can't even get there at all (bot chatter, the "enemy spotted" and "need backup" voice commands for easy communication) - plus, buying this game unlocks many useful textures in Garry's Mod, which are required for quite a few of that game's servers & maps.
Jogo muito divertido pra quem tem pc fraco.

1) You have played counter strike before
